roleset.name: thread a rope through or around an opening, perhaps to fasten
roleset.note: REEVE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Vncls tape-22.4-1. Comparison to 'fasten'. (from reeve.01-v)

role.descr: first or all things being threaded

example.name: Args 0-3
example.text: He reeved the end of the rope through the pulley block, and we attached the end to No.2 oar.

example.name: animate patient (as the opening)
example.text: I-1 was *trace*-1 reeved down a 100?-150? reeve line in the center of a long high line across the falls.
example.arg: in the center of a long high line across the falls

example.name: reeving around something
example.text: Some Hessian soldiers were reeving ropes over the arm of the tree.
example.arg: over the arm of the trees

example.name: With instrument
example.text: Instead, [the membrane]-1 was reeved *trace*-1 with nonresorbable sutures to achieve straightening.
